title: I forgot the screen lock password. What can I do?
answer:
Â Forcibly unlock the phone, which will erase all user information. After the phone is powered off, press and hold the power and volume up keys. When the startup screen is displayed, wait for 3s, and then release the power key. After the recovery screen (shown in Figure 9-1) is displayed, release the volume up key. Press the volume up key to scroll to **wipe data/factory reset **and press the power key for confirmation. Then scroll to **Yes-delete all user data **and press the power key. 


 **NOTE: ** 

 Selecting **Yes-delete all user data **will delete all customer information.
